CrowdsaleBase.getState (/unique_chucks/39/0x0bad3d6bca8d28d3531544aaec9968105e287043.sol#630-658) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/39/0x0bad3d6bca8d28d3531544aaec9968105e287043.sol#644-658)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/39/0x0bad3d6bca8d28d3531544aaec9968105e287043.sol#643-658)
